steps.name: I retrieve the JSON results
the status code should be 200
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].achievementType" with value "BADGE"
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].achievementId" with value "WHIZKIDBADGE"
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].isShowPopup" with value "true"
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].isDisplayPopupComment" with value "false"
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].spotCount" with value "1"
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].achievementOrder" with value "1"
The response should contain "$..referenceAchievements[*].displayType" with value "true"
